dhow.name: Dhow
dhow.description: A small vessel originally built for hunting wildlife along rivers and coastlines

bedar.name: Bedar
bedar.description: A small motorized boat capable of ramming targets and causing flood damage.

hulk.name: Hulk
hulk.description: This ship is more durable, able to sustain continuous damage, and excels at withstanding incoming fire.

cutter.name: Cutter
cutter.description: A vessel capable of supporting other ships in intense combat.

barge.name: Barge
barge.description: A ship specialized in causing fire and burn damage, then spreading chaos to nearby vessels.
